name: What on Earth
slogan: The e-commerce for good fashion brands
description:
Vision

We believe that the Magic of the upcoming decade will be unleashed if we focus on the Environmental & Social Mess we have created. 

Fashion is the second most polluting industry in the world and we are on a mission to help clean it up!

We have curated beautiful garments from up-cycled, re-cycled, vegan and organic materials.

So...what is the product?

Basically an Etsy for good fashion brands with the user friendliness of Airbnb and a kick ass brand like Reformation.

team.name: Blanca Arias Borrell
team.bioHtml: CEO of The magic is in the mess. Strong business background and ambition to change things for the better!

jobs.title: Co-Founder / Chief Marketing Officer
jobs.description:
Looking for someone to take over the role of CMO of the company. 
Experience in marketing is desirable but not an absolute must. I believe more in personal qualities rather than in acquired knowledge. 

If you are someone energetic who loves to create and is excited to take over a role of responsibility in a start up, please apply!

jobs.title: Social Creative Intern
jobs.description:
We’re looking for an eager, energetic, passionate, creative and engaged social creative intern who’s ready to hit the ground running and utilize their honed skills to create content for our brand presence in various social media channels and internal and external communication.

Responsibilities:
You will be responsible for supporting the creation of the brand’s social media outputs and internal and external communication with customers and fashion brands.

If you are someone energetic who loves to create and is wants to gather some experience in a growing start up, please apply!

jobs.title: Social Media Intern
jobs.description:
We’re looking for an eager, energetic, passionate and engaged social creative intern who’s ready to hit the ground running and utilize their honed skills to manage our brand presence in various social media channels.

**Responsibilities:**
You will be responsible for creating and overseeing the overall brand’s social media presence in Instagram and TikTok and building an engaged audience.

If you are an energetic individual who wants to gather professional experience and be part of an exciting company just being created, apply!
jobs.descriptionHtml:
We’re looking for an eager, energetic, passionate and engaged social creative intern who’s ready to hit the ground running and utilize their honed skills to manage our brand presence in various social media channels.

jobs.title: Fabric / Material / Fashion Expert
jobs.description:
In the Magic in the Mess we curate independent fashion brands that produce garments and products with sustainability at the heart fo their design process. 

We have a strong focus on the materials they use and curate brands that only produce with upcycled, recycled, organic and/or vegan materials.

We're looking for someone with a sound knowledge in different fabric materials to support the overall company curation strategy and preparation of the educational content aspect of the marketplace.

If you want to be part of an exciting, fun, company just being created, please apply!
jobs.descriptionHtml:
In the Magic in the Mess we curate independent fashion brands that produce garments and products with sustainability at the heart fo their design process.

We have a strong focus on the materials they use and curate brands that only produce with upcycled, recycled, organic and/or vegan materials.

We're looking for someone with a sound knowledge in different fabric materials to support the overall company curation strategy and preparation of the educational content aspect of the marketplace.

If you want to be part of an exciting, fun, company just being created, please apply!

jobs.title: Graphic Designer Intern
jobs.description:
We’re looking for a passionate, creative **Graphic designer intern** who's ready to hit the ground running and utilize their honed skills to help us create a bold brand. We are building a brand that is fun, modern, innovative, and transparent.

You will have the freedom to use your experience, leadership traits, and innovative initiatives to complete your daily tasks.

*Responsibilities:*
You will be responsible for creating and shaping the overall brand’s visual aspect, which should capture the attention and inspire our target audience. 
Tasks:
•	Create designs for corporate branded creative outputs including: logo, images, quote designs, infographics, packaging, etc.
•	Oversee overall brand’s output to ensure consistency in the branding aesthetics across different channels: social media, e-mail marketing, website, packaging, …

jobs.title: Software Engineer / Programmer / Web developer
jobs.description:
We are looking for someone to help us define and develop the e-commerce platform of the future, one in which you can only buy products from brands that design with sustainability as a priority. 

By joining our team, you will have the chance to be part of an exciting, fast growing start up from the very beginning!
jobs.descriptionHtml:
We are looking for someone to help us define and develop the e-commerce platform of the future, one in which you can only buy products from brands that design with sustainability as a priority.

By joining our team, you will have the chance to be part of an exciting, fast growing start up from the very beginning!

jobs.title: UX / UI Designer
jobs.description:
We are looking for a creative UI/UX Designer to join our team!
As an UI-UX Designer, you will be responsible for delivering the best online user experience, which makes your role extremely important for our success and ensuring customer satisfaction and loyalty.

By joining our team, you will have the chance to be part of an exciting, fast growing start up from the very beginning!
